name: Evocation
description: Specialists in elemental and explosive magic.

2.name: Evocation Savant
2.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy an evocation spell into your spellbook is halved.

2.name: Sculpt Spells
2.description: When you cast an evocation spell that affects other creatures you can see, choose 1 + the spell's level creatures to automatically succeed on their saves and take no damage.

6.name: Potent Cantrip
6.description: Your damaging cantrips deal half damage to creatures that succeed on their saving throws.

10.name: Empowered Evocation
10.description: Add your Intelligence modifier to one damage roll of any wizard evocation spell you cast.

14.name: Overchannel
14.description: When you cast a 1st- through 5th-level wizard spell that deals damage, you can deal maximum damage. The first time causes no harm; each additional use before a long rest deals escalating 2d12 necrotic damage per spell level.
